channel.title: Monitor on Edgarxue's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Monitor on Edgarxue's Site

item.title: Zabbix监控nginx脚本两种
item.description: shell脚本 #!/bin/bash HOST="127.0.0.1" PORT="8080" function ping { /sbin/pidof nginx | wc -l } function active { /usr/bin/curl -s http://$HOST:$PORT/ngstatus|awk '/Active/ {print $NF}' } function Reading { /usr/bin/curl -s http://$HOST:$PORT/ngstatus| awk '/Reading/ {print $2}' } function Writing { /usr/bin/curl -s http://$HOST:$PORT/ngstatus | awk '/Writing/ {print $4}' } function Waiting { /usr/bin/curl -s http://$HOST:$PORT/ngstatus| awk '/Waiting/ {print $6}' } function accepts { /usr/bin/curl -s http://$HOST:$PORT/ngstatus| sed -n '3 p' | awk '{print $1}' } function handled { /usr/bin/curl -s http://$HOST:$PORT/ngstatus| sed -n '3 p' | awk '{print $2}' } function requests { /usr/bin/curl -s http://$HOST:$PORT/ngstatus| sed -n '3 p' | awk '{print $3}' } $1 python脚本 import requests import json import sys host = '127.
